title: How to Make Sinigang Na Hipon (Shrimp in Sour Soup)

steps.headline: Add boiled water and shrimps to a casserole dish.
Take the shrimps from the pot when they float up.
steps.description: When the shrimps float to the top, scoop and set aside.

steps.headline: Take care not to overcook the shrimp.
steps.description: Overcooked shrimp become tough and rubbery.

steps.headline: Add Tamarind mix, onions, tomatoes, sitaw, green long pepper and radish.
Lower fire or heat, simmer for 5 minutes.
Add kangkong leaves then turn off the heat.
Add the cooked shrimp to the soup when ready to serve.

text: Add boiled water and shrimps to a casserole dish.  Take the shrimps from the pot when they float up. When the shrimps float to the top, scoop and set aside. Take care not to overcook the shrimp. Overcooked shrimp become tough and rubbery. Add Tamarind mix, onions, tomatoes, sitaw, green long pepper and radish.  Lower fire or heat, simmer for 5 minutes.  Add kangkong leaves then turn off the heat.  Add the cooked shrimp to the soup when ready to serve.  Serve hot.
